About-description: For the first time in Indonesia, Catmate present a multipurpose platform for cat lovers. Catmate makes it easy for cat lovers to do cat matching, thereby simplifying the cat mating process.
About-description2: Catmate is packaged with a simple, attractive, easy-to-use and definitely safe because its supported by a cyber security system.
Feature-one-description: Find many options to be your cat mate. Not only pictures, you can also get detailed cat info here.
Feature-two-description: Helping you find the nearest vet to consult about your cat.
Feature-three-description: You can find a cat of your choice to accompany the existing cat.
Feature-four-description: These facts based, grooming tips & tricks can help you as a ameteur cat owner.
Feature-five-description: Bebas berbelanja kebutuhan kucing di petshop dengan rating terbaik.
Pricing3: for the moment you can enjoy the app for free, ciauu
Testimony1: Keren banget sih aplikasinya, jadi gausah susah-susah cari kucing sampe ke luar kota.
Testimony2: Gila sih, zaman makin canggih aja. Kalah gue sama kucing gue. Sama-sama pake datting app tapi dia duluan yang kawin hahaha.
Testimony3: Thank you!! Berkat aplikasi ini kucing aku sekarang hamil yaaayyy!
Faq-one-description3: Input your data according to your cat condition.
Faq-one-description4: And you ready to use CATMATE.

Who-we-are2: CATMATE is a startup created by Tupai Tech.
Who-we-are3: Tupai Tech or Tupai Technology is an IT Agency under the auspices of Trisya Media Technology wich founded since Februari 2021 in Surakarta.
Who-we-are4: With integrity and professionalism, Tupai Tech provides IT Services to support any of you who are involved in digital transformation.
Contact-one-description: With an easy move you can connect with us.
Contact-two-description: Open close communication with fast move.
